document.full_text: india has shortlisted european defense firms dassault  and eurofighter for an $11 billion fighter jet contract, rejecting u.s. and russian firms in a move that indicates an effort by asia's third largest economy to broaden its strategic ties.
document.title: india shortlists europeans, rejects u.s. for jet order: sources
lines_and_colors: india has shortlisted european defense firms dassault  and eurofighter for an $11 billion fighter jet contract, rejecting u.s. and russian firms in a move that indicates an effort by asia's third largest economy to broaden its strategic ties.
